func.title: Find_Category

param.name: category
param.desc: Object category of the objects to find.

func.desc: Search criterion: finds all objects of the specified category.
func.remark: For additional information on the use of this function see FindObjects.

example.text: Returns a list of all buildings.
Returns all active goal and rule objects. Notice that categories can be combined using "|". This will find all objects which fulfill at least one of the categories.
